system.description: Almost as shady as the @L[Class:Assassin]{Assassin}, a Thief is a bit more socially oriented and has a much greater care for her own life. Thieves are the flip side of the Samurai and tend to follow laws and tell the truth only if it serves their purpose. Always trying to make a profit, thieves are the businessmen of the world and will cheat you without blinking an eyelash, that is their job. If you are playing a thief, lie and make up stories, be ever watchful for a chance to search or loot and look for the profit angle, never doing anything for free.

overview.base: You become @L[Condition:Hidden]{hidden}. As you do this, you may roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk]]. If this is greater than your @L[Core:Passive Attributes]{passive} @L[Core:Sneak]{sneak} ([[/roll 10 + @snk]]), then you use it as your hidden DC. If not, use your @L[Core:Passive Attributes]{passive} @L[Core:Sneak]{sneak}.
overview.proficient: Instead roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk + @p]] for your hidden DC (if it's greater than your @L[Core:Passive Attributes]{passive} @L[Core:Sneak]{sneak}).
overview.fluent: Instead roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk + @f]] for your hidden DC (if it's greater than your @L[Core:Passive Attributes]{passive} @L[Core:Sneak]{sneak}).

system.requirements: You are in a location with shadows, dim light, @L[Core:Cover]{three-quarters cover}, or some other feature which the @L[Core:GM]{GM} determines is appropriate for being @L[Condition:Hidden]{hidden}. You must remain in areas that maintain these conditions to stay @L[Condition:Hidden]{hidden}.

overview.proficient: This also makes the effect of that @L[Category:Abilities]{ability} @L[Core:Fizzles]{fizzle}.

results.hit: Target becomes @L[Keyword:Incapable]{incapable} of the @L[Category:Abilities]{ability} they were using.

value.variable: This costs 0 @L[Core:MP]{MP} if the triggering @L[Category:Abilities]{ability} was used on you or some @L[Category:Equipment]{equipment} you @L[Keyword:Bearing]{bear}. It costs 1 @L[Core:MP]{MP} otherwise.

system.endCondition: At the end of each of the target's @L[Core:Turn]{turns}, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.
system.requirements: You may only target the triggering creature.
system.trigger: Another creature uses a non-@L[Category:Basic abilities]{basic} @L[Category:Active abilities]{active} or @L[Category:Reactive abilities]{reactive ability} that isn't a @L[Category:Spells]{spell} against a different creature or some @L[Category:Equipment]{equipment} that different creature @L[Keyword:Bearing]{bares}.

overview.base: Target is @L[Property:Glued]{glued} to the creature @L[Keyword:Bearing]{bearing} it.

system.requirements: Target item must be @L[Keyword:Bearing]{beared} by a creature.

overview.base: Target is no longer @L[Property:Glued]{glued} and you take it.

system.requirements: Target's bearer is @L[Condition:Down]{down} or target it @L[Property:Searchable]{searchable}.

overview.base: You are a @L[Keyword:Talented]{talented} @L[Tradecraft:Locksmith]{locksmith}.
